general.lang_desc: SPK CONF: Lower case two letter iso language code e.g. 'en'
general.acc_desc: SPK CONF: Lower case two letter iso code e.g. 'ga' - General American
general.reg_desc: SPK CONF: Lower case two letter region iso code e.g. 'us' - United States
general.spk_desc: SPK CONF: Lower case three letter speaker code e.g. 'bdl' - Arctic bdl speaker
general.srate_desc: Sample rate to build voice in Hz i.e. 16000 or 22050
general.buildid_desc: Unique id for this build (typically YYMMDD)
general.flist_desc: File containing one file name stem per line either with or without spk value e.g. bdl_a0001_001 or a0001_001. If set uses only these files to build a voice.
general.clean_desc: If set keeps all data generated in idlak-scratch
general.depend_desc: Build dependent modules if no present

logging.nolog_desc: Switch off log messages to file or screen or both
logging.logdir_desc: Directory to write log file if writing to file
logging.loglevel_desc: one of None, Critical, Error, Warn, Info, Debug
logging.logtofile_desc: If set log messages to file
logging.logtostderr_desc: If set log messages to screen on stderr

pitch_def.getf0_desc: The location of the get_f0 binary.
pitch_def.pplain_desc: The location of the pplain binary.

align_def.break_desc: Assign break type 2 if pause less 0.03 sec, Assign break type 3 if pause less 0.2 sec
